Classified Skins.name: P250 | Franklin
Classified Skins.desc: It has been painted using a hydrographic of American hundred-dollar bills.

Restricted Skins.name: AK-47 | Emerald Pinstripe
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been given a bog oak stock and painted a white and green pinstripes.
Restricted Skins.lore: Questioning Imogen is questioning me. Now Relax, have some scotch, and let's talk business - The Father and The Phoenix Part 2

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Desert Eagle | Meteorite
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted with metallic paint, using a crystallizing mask to create a pattern.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Everyone wants to make an impact

Mil-Spec Skins.name: CZ75-Auto | Tuxedo
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a black and white color scheme.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: For when combat is a black tie affair

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Galil AR | Tuxedo
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a black and white color scheme.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: For when combat is a black tie affair

Industrial Grade Skins.name: G3SG1 | Green Apple
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a green and black color scheme.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: An apple a day keeps insurance premiums high

Industrial Grade Skins.name: Glock-18 | Death Rattle
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted with a snakeskin patterned hydrographic.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: I know you don't believe in the cause...and when I expose you, Valeria will have your head - The Shield and The Serpent Part 1

Industrial Grade Skins.name: UMP-45 | Carbon Fiber
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a carbon fiber hydrographic over a graphite base coat.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Just because I carried my team doesn't mean it wasn't a team effort - Rona Sabri, Rising Star

Industrial Grade Skins.name: MAC-10 | Silver
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted with a chrome base coat and candied in transparent silver anodized effect paint.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: There is beauty in simplicity - Franz Kriegeld, Phoenix Tactician

Industrial Grade Skins.name: Nova | Caged Steel
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted with a hex pattern using stencilled metal flake paint, then covered in an oval cutout hydrographic.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Negev | Army Sheen
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been covered in a metallic foil stamped with a camouflage pattern.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: MP7 | Forest DDPAT
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a Digital Disruptive Pattern (DDPAT) hydrographic.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: By the time you're close enough to notice the pixels it's already too late

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Sawed-Off | Forest DDPAT
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a Digital Disruptive Pattern (DDPAT) hydrographic.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: By the time you're close enough to notice the pixels it's already too late

Consumer Grade Skins.name: SG 553 | Army Sheen
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been covered in a metallic foil stamped with a camouflage pattern.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: R8 Revolver | Bone Mask
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been spray-painted using a tangle of masking tape as a stencil.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: True power is demonstrated with subtle application

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Tec-9 | Urban DDPAT
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a Digital Disruptive Pattern (DDPAT) hydrographic.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: By the time you're close enough to notice the pixels it's already too late
